snippet.title: DEAD DETENTION (Rescribbled) - Trailer (Wishlist + Try the Demo!)
snippet.description:
* Wishlish and play Episode 1: https://t.co/c3PMcZUOFl *

DEAD DETENTION is a scribbly coming of age/adventure visual novel about a nerdy teen turned dooms day survivor. Will you and your new friends get to safety?!

STORY
* 15 year old Max is given a detention for falling asleep in class - but a zombie outbreak suddenly interrupts it! Senior student Naomi saves him from a deadly attack, but can't leave campus without her lost sister Sora.
* Deciding to stay behind and help her, Max and Naomi begin their quest to find Sora, while struggling to survive the quickly spreading virus...

CHOICES
* Make narrative choices that are brave, scared, nice or mean.
* Your choices will compound and lead to 1 of 3 endings, including a special true ending.

MICROGAMES
* Complete quick microgames throughout the story to swing your bat, run from zombies, climb ladders, and much more.
* Each episode builds to a fun boss challenge - such as target shooting and boxing!
* Features 3 difficulties, including an unlockable Hard Mode.

DEAD DETENTION is a rescribbled and fully remade version of the cult flash series. It features 5 episodes of chaotic fun, plus a special epilogue unlocked by achieving either of the good endings.
